title: Promotions and Placements
body:
Dear Riot

â€‹I think you need to explain to players how you rank them.

I won 4 out of 6 games and was placed bronze V (no ladder long enough to escape).

I really don't like playing your game when I have no way of understanding how I got the rank from placements, and all I can do is cling to the glimmer of hope that the program for sorting promos is broken. If there was something that could tell me why I score low or what your programs are looking for then, I'd feel a lot better and more importantly, have a more comprehensive understanding of what to do to improve.

I get the whole "give the customer the feeling of satisfaction when they climb" but honestly it makes customers feel unsatisfied with L.O.L as a product because they have no way of knowing why they are placed in their current position. Please do something about this, I love your game but honestly you guys have let the team down on this one.

Sincerely 
Fraze1990

replies.body:
Vast majority of people get placed lower than their previous end of season rank. Doing really well in preseason and/or placements and/or having stopped before reaching your peak last season are all things that can net you a slightly higher placement, but it sounds like you had a low bronze end rank last season which pretty much guarantees you a Bronze 5 placement.

There were two popups that showed in the client when the ranked season started that explicitly stated you would more than likely be placed lower.
